definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: sedan, litter, palanquin (so NH; origin dub.; no plausible Shemitic etymol.; perh. (so RS in Yule:Gloss. of Anglo-Indian words, 502) Skr. paryaṅka, litter-bed, ‘palankeen;’ perh. (if poem be late) Gr. fore=on;—LXX has forei=on, Vulgate ferculum, SyrVer puwryo0, Targum [[פּוֹרְיׇא]]) Ct So 3:9 [[עָשָׂה לוֹ הֶמֶּלֶח שְׁלֽמׂה]] ´[[א]].
